QuestData.Title: Heavy Artillery
QuestData.Description: Bad news, friend. They're bringing in serious firepower now.$b$bWe've spotted a tank on the northern hill by the windmill. They can reach the other side of the town from there. We can't let them set it up.$b$bWhat do you say to giving them a taste of their own medicine? If you can take out their commander, you'd have a fancy new tank all to yourself. Imagine the mayhem you could unleash on their invasion!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He must be tough if he's been selected to pilot their experimental weapon. Be careful!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Captain Wormwood and commandeer the Experimental War Machine.
QuestData.CompletionText: If that cannon can reach Brennadam, it can reach those zeppelins!
QuestData.RewardText: Those were some explosions! I'm just glad they were directed at the Horde and not us.
